languages.text: "Даже в борьбе с несправедливостью ваш вид исхитряется взрастить еще больше зла".
"Even when it is fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."
languages.original_text: "Даже в борьбе с несправедливостью ваш вид исхитряется взрастить еще больше зла".

traits.locale_text: "Even when fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."
"Even when fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."
"Even when it is fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."
"Even when it is fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."
"Even when it is fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."

languages.text: «Incluso al combatir la injusticia, los tuyos solo consiguen generar más maldad».
languages.original_text: "Even when it is fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."

traits.locale_text: «Incluso al combatir la injusticia, los tuyos solo consiguen generar más maldad».

languages.text: 「不正と闘っているときでさえ、お前の種族はその中でさらなる悪を助長するだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Even when it is fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."

traits.locale_text: 「不正と闘っているときでさえ、お前の種族はその中でさらなる悪を助長するだけだ」

languages.text: “即便是要与邪恶战斗，你们的族群也只会在这个过程中培育出更多的邪恶之物。”
languages.original_text: "Even when it is fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."

traits.locale_text: “即便是要与邪恶战斗，你们的族群也只会在这个过程中培育出更多的邪恶之物。”

languages.text: "Selbst wenn Euresgleichen Ungerechtigkeit bekämpft, bringt Ihr nur noch mehr Böses hervor."
languages.original_text: "Even when it is fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."

traits.locale_text: "Selbst wenn Euresgleichen Ungerechtigkeit bekämpft, bringt Ihr nur noch mehr Böses hervor."

languages.text: « Même quand elle combat l'injustice, votre espèce ne réussit qu'à promouvoir le mal dans ses rangs. »
languages.original_text: "Even when it is fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."

traits.locale_text: « Même quand elle combat l'injustice, votre espèce ne réussit qu'à promouvoir le mal dans ses rangs. »

languages.text: "Türün adaletsizliğe karşı savaşırken bile geçtiği yerlerde yalnızca daha fazla kötülük doğurmayı başarıyor."
languages.original_text: "Even when it is fighting injustice, your kind only manages to foster more evil in its midst."
